channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WOOCS – Currency Switcher for WooCommerce. Professional and Free multi currency plugin – Pay in selected currency
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WOOCS – Currency Switcher for WooCommerce. Professional and Free multi currency plugin – Pay in selected currency

item.title: CVE-2021-24938|2024-08-03T19:49:13.917Z -- unknown -- woocs%20%E2%80%93%20currency%20switcher%20for%20woocommerce.%20professional%20and%20free%20multi%20currency%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20pay%20in%20selected%20currency
item.description: The WOOCS WordPress plugin before 1.3.7.1 does not sanitise and escape the key parameter of the woocs_update_profiles_data AJAX action (available to any authenticated user) before outputting it back in the response, leading to a Reflected cross-Site Scripting issue

item.title: CVE-2021-25043|2024-08-03T19:49:14.600Z -- unknown -- woocs%20%E2%80%93%20currency%20switcher%20for%20woocommerce.%20professional%20and%20free%20multi%20currency%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20pay%20in%20selected%20currency
item.description: The WOOCS WordPress plugin before 1.3.7.3 does not sanitise and escape the custom_prices parameter before outputting it back in the response, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue
